profile.name: Rose Judge
profile.bio: Rose is an Open Source Engineer who co-maintains Tern, an Open Source container inspection tool that creates a Software Bill of Materials for a given container. Besides driving the project forward, her goals as a maintainer are to help open source newbies get their first pull request merged and grow the contributor community around Tern. When sheâ€™s not chasing her dog or son around the house, you can find her running, baking, reading or napping.

project.name: Tern
project.description: Tern is an Open Source container inspection tool that creates a Software Bill of Materials for a given container.

talkTitle: Letting them down easy: How to nicely say "no" to unwanted change proposals
